name: Fenrir
description:
Fenrir Inc. is Japan’s No. 1 software development company specializing in smartphone applications. We started conducting collaborative development with our clients since the dawn of the App Market, and currently possess an excellent track record of over 500 developed apps. In addition, we have taken on development projects assigned by over 300 different leading companies spanning a vast range of industries.
Unlike regular development agencies, Fenrir employs a large number of UX/UI designers who strive to deliver designs that are not only visually appealing, but also focus on usability, real life experiences, use cases, and different kinds of technologies.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 14F Tower B(Office), Grand Front Osaka, 3-1 Ofukacho, Kita-ku,
